website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-install rear-vision camera with an extra-wide view that can be used with any mobile device.
pros: Smart and durable stainless steel license plate contains IP69 camera with LEDs and 170° view
True HD 1024 x 600 image transmitted to your Android or iOS device
Fast, easy setup on any vehicle
cons: Dash/windshield mount for phone is not supplied

customer_reviews.title: Hi-Def
customer_reviews.text: I could have installed it myself but chose to have it installed professionally. Picture is exceptional. The camera and license frame appears solid. The camera links to the SWD Camera iPhone app easily. The company is also offering a free dash cam. Haven't gotten it yet but I hope it has the same quality as the back up camera. Excellent customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install. Great Build
customer_reviews.text: Put this on older truck for hooking up camper trailer. Bought cheap four wire trailer wire harness to just plug in to existing. Super easy... Downloaded app, connected to camera WIFI, and Wala... My wife's truck camera is higher, (looks down.) Little easier to gauge when on the mark, but this product just dandy as well. Economic solution. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: raptorRunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to your car!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Upon receiving it, it was packaged very well, very easy to install and download the app for your phone. On thing in particular that I like about the mounting of the frame is that it bolts through to the inside of the car, which makes for very high anti-theft concerns. I also like the option to wire it to a reverse light or more constant power such as running lights, which allows you to have the camera on to see blindspot while driving. I definitely recommend things product to ANYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Great safety solution for older cars
customer_reviews.text: Impressive, solidly constructed camera and license plate frame. Securely mounts to car and is theft-proof. Not hard to install with basic auto repair skills. Camera image is very sharp and adapts to full screen when phone is in landscape position. Mobile phone app install was very easy and the camera image comes up quickly, like a factory cam with no lag time. I connected to brake light for power as the brake is always depressed when reversing. Wiring is easier if car has reverse or brake lights on the trunk lid. Otherwise run wires along trunk hinge conduit to rear light assembly which may require extending the wires. Recommend splice and solder to vehicle wiring for reliable connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delay when Backing Up
customer_reviews.text: I got a new car that didn’t have a backup cam; installed this to use. When I put the car in reverse, it doesn’t connect automatically like it should; even have the WiFi setting to automatically connect. It kind of defeats the reason I installed it since it has to be forced to connect to turn on. I’d give it a full five star rating if the app was more cooperative. Definitely feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Install on 05 BMW 330Ci
customer_reviews.text: Drilled hole in trunk lid just above camera wire. Pulled back liner of trunk lid and fished wiring to backup light area. Identified blue positive wire that connects to backup light and spliced the red wire from camera to it. Fastened black wire from camera with sheet metal screw to chassis metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a switch
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 trailers, and use 3 trucks to haul them. I’m planning on mounting this camera on all my trucks. My only complaint, is when I’m near a WiFi signal (like my house), my phone switches to that, when I take the truck out of reverse. So then I have to go into the phone and switch back to the camera WiFi. It’s better than the system I had, and works great when I’m away from known networks. I might run a switch to it, so it stays connected when I need it, and I can turn off when I don’t. I do still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Dan

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Took about 5 minutes install just unscrew the license plate bolts and put the camera on. Connection was easy with my iPhone. Performance wise: 1.) It connects every time with no issues. 2.) Camera gives a wide view of what is going on behind your Rv. For you married RVers this takes away the backup drama that always an concern when going to a new camp site. Sorry no photos but the image is clearer than my backup camera on my F250 mirror monitor. Love it and would by again. Yes I would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese Head

customer_reviews.title: CHECK IF IT'S AN OPEN BOX!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was an open box until I finally had a chance to meet with my mechanic (my car is a bit complicated to work with). When I showed him the camera he immediately pointed out the screw marks on the frame and the end of the cables all showing that it's been worked with. I chose to go with it just because I don't want to waste my time waiting for a new one to be delivered and making another appointment to get it installed. But definitely disappointed with receiving a used product. One other thing that's inconvenient is that when you need to reverse multiple times the camera doesn't automatically reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be a great purchase. it has a great signal and great resolution. I had intended to use it on my truck and use the Garmin Drive as the monitor. For those of you thinking the same, It won't work . Garmin is Bluetooth only link & sync.. The signal is strong enough to reach my phone from the back of the camper, So new plan... Update: I intended to use this on my Camper, but found it would not fit the existing Plate area.
customer_reviews.author: the Beerman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!  Does NOT seem to provide the image as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 8 running IOS 12.3.1. I hooked this camera up and tried it BEFORE installing it in my car and found that while it DOES work and sends a camera image to my phone, that image only fills about 2/3 of my phone's screen in landscape mode...and only provides a tiny rectangle about 2" x 2.5" when in portrait mode. Nothing like the full screen image shown on the flashy ad on Amazon! I have written the Calmoor about this....we'll see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - easy install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for vehicles without backup cameras. It was very easy to install. I installed it on my 2014 mustang with no problem. I searched on youtube for videos showing how to access the backup light wire. The rest was easy. I did have a minor problem with the provided monitor mount. I contacted calmoor and the issue was resolved almost immediately. Great customer service. I plan on buying another for my 2013 Ford Escape.
customer_reviews.author: The Gman

customer_reviews.title: It's easy
customer_reviews.text: This little system is super easy to use. You do need to splice a couple of wires, but it isnt difficult to figure out. Once it's installed, just download the app and access it. Took me about fifteen minutes and I'm not an electrician. Using the system is also easy, but takes a minute, because you'll have to connect to the camera via WIFI, then go back to the app to connect. For me, this is better than having to find a place for another video screen.
customer_reviews.author: DonB

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not all that I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The camera and the wireless feed work both worked right away. And the picture quality is fine. The installation instructions are totally inadequate ("Step 1: wire it to a power source"), and in the end I had it professionally installed. It is not very good at helping me judge distance of something that I am backing towards and the distance to obstacles that I am trying to back around.
customer_reviews.author: WL

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.text: Can I give this zero stars? The app it uses has one star, but I didn’t find that out until hooking up the thing to my camper. We tried on two apple phones and an android, no pic. Uninstalled and reinstalled and it never worked. Even without the app working the “signal” from the thing it had a weak signal to the front of the car, and only a 17’ camper.
customer_reviews.author: Review Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi backup camera.
customer_reviews.text: I like the material quality of the license plate and the camera. I believe it is best to connect it to a continuous power source when the key is on. I like that it sends a signal to my cell phone where the pic is displayed in very high quality. The phone is much more manageable than a stationary monitor. I would recommend this camera to to anyone with an RV or auto.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture quality during day and night
customer_reviews.text: I watched a YouTube video first to see how to tap into my backup lights on my F150. The rest of the connection and wireless to iPhone setup was easy (and intuitive) if you've ever installed smart products in your home or car. The plate housing is good quality and the camera assembly looks clean and seamless. I would buy this again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W

customer_reviews.title: A good license plate backup camera
customer_reviews.text: This backup camera is great. It is easy to install and easy to use. It doesn’t block the license plate much (something that many other license plate backup cameras do). It’s not at the same level as built in cameras in newer cars, but it’s a great thing to have when parking in tight spaces to assure you don’t hit anything behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Russel K

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 30 minutes to install. The process was made very easy because the connection cable has a disconnect plug in the center to help in running the cable to your lights. I attached it to my running lights so that it is always on. When I'm ready to back up, I just click on the app on my phone. Thank ;you
customer_reviews.author: Christopheram

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Backup camera was easy to install in my 2000 Chevy Z71 picture is very clear on my phone. Seems to be durable so it should last a long time. I enjoy being able to see to back up to my trailers with out having to get in and out of the truck. I will definitely be recommending to my friends that have older vehicles .
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good backup camera.
customer_reviews.text: The video image is great, the quality of the product is solid, installation is really easy, great product if you don't have a screen on your dashboard, your phone is the screen, the only problem is it will take a few seconds for you to see the image, because the camera has to connect to your phone every time you put your car in reverse but once you get the image, is great, I'll add the video later
customer_reviews.author: Dark Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Works great, WHEN it works
customer_reviews.text: Install wasn't much trouble, and when it links it works great. Unfortunately I have to open and close the app a few times to get it to link usually. Every time you come out of reverse it shuts down, then must reboot and RE link, poorly. Too much lag and too much rebooting of the app to be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Back Dr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic backup camera for my 2007 Rav4
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2007 RAV4 with no backup camera and I was hoping to get one. After researching and looking at different backup camera, I came across this one. I was surprised by the price for camera that require no hard wiring and as easy to install. I ordered it and it was delivered in 2 days and i installed it right away looking at the instruction that was in the box. Overall, its a fantastic purchase for me and I don't have to work hard to reverse my car because this device just make it easier for me. Great price, Great support and Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Adhikari

customer_reviews.title: Simple power and ground quick app
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very solid metal and I'm a man ya know we never read instructions lol it was super simple
customer_reviews.author: Herke’s

customer_reviews.title: Kinda ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this thing is basically a pos... it's cheap and that's the only reason I kept it... works on wifi and the app is too dumb to use its own wifi only when open, you have to select the wifi network, wait to connect, then start the app
customer_reviews.author: Neal Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and excellent customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with the product. I had difficulty with getting the app on the phone to communicate with the camera so company sent out their small display and it works beautifully. Impressed with quality of image and clarity at night.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at the quality
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up and had it mounted and running in 30 minutes. App is wonderful. Picture is crystal clear. I'm so happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Improved blind spot visibilty.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Visibility greatly improved. I used on 34' enclosed trailer. No issues with connectivity. Some delay but not terrible. Its nice knowing whats behind me when backing up/confimation Im tracking in right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Schneider Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera new from amazon. I installed on my f250, carefully following the instructions. Once installed, I downloaded the app and opened it to pair to the camera. The app connected for a few minutes then “could not find device”. I rechecked all the wiring to make sure it was all installed correctly. I reached out to customer support to get help but could not get in touch with them. I took the camera off and packaged it back up. I sent an email to the “warranty department”. I got no response and I am now stuck with a none working camera and I am out $120.00
customer_reviews.author: D. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for price! Plus super easy install!
customer_reviews.text: This product came on time and packaged nicely. It worked even better than anticipated and it was super easy to install! I'll definitely continue buying from this seller based on my experience. I can choose between my iPad or iPhone when viewing the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique A Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the camera for a few days but the install was easy and it all worked as soon as I plugged it in. I used it the following weekend and backing up to my camper was super easy! I couldn't decide where I wanted to mount the screen so that took a little time, but there were several mounts and different options in the box so that helped me try out a few different spots. Overall super happy with the initial use and I'm hopeful that it will make it through the winter until next camping season!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jipping

customer_reviews.title: Display
customer_reviews.text: The problem is the display which for me is an old iPhone. You have to put the car in reverse, wake up the phone, make sure the app is open, and then it takes some time for the Wi-Fi signal to connect to the phone before you actually get to use the camera. If you’re expecting to get a display showing what’s behind you by putting the car in reverse, unless the cameras on all the time, you’re not gonna get a display immediately. Other than that it seems to be a decent camera so probably good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Guy K.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my galaxy S8 and S5 also worked on my pumpkin car stereo with android 4.4. Connects very fast to my phone when starting the vehicle. Would be cool if the app could record video. Does take pictures though.
customer_reviews.author: DualSportRider

customer_reviews.title: Great backup camera.
customer_reviews.text: With only having to tap into the backup lights of my pickup and not having to run a wire from the rear to the cab, this backup camera was so easy to install. The resolution is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Merchant not honest.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT fall for the scam of free gifts like dash camera in exchange for a 5 star review. It never showed, despite many email promises (from vaniety@outlook.com). Merchants should not lie! That ruins the sale, despite how good the product is. The item worked ok, one needs to be careful that it is connected via wifi, not bluetooth. The software can jump to different wifi's and unable to connect to the backup camera. Better to have a dedicated camera for it rather than the phone.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something like this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product came as expected and I'm using it for my 1997 Mercedes Benz that didn’t come equipped with a backup camera. I am pleased to know this is a wireless licenses plate where I can connect it to my iphone as the view camera.
customer_reviews.author: Camelot

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: we mounted the camera on the back of our 20 ft. trailer, stood in front of our 3500 and the camera picture was clear. Haven't used it at night yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Turner

customer_reviews.title: A great, quality product. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I found the camera very easy to install. I did have to make up a different mounting plate for the camera because our licence plates are a different size (bigger) than the plate designed for the surround. In the end the camera mounted very easily. I got the wires connected by an Auto Electrician, mounted to the number plate lights. I really like it sending the signal to my phone rather than me having to mount another screen in my truck. The product is very well made and top quality. Thanks Calmoor.
customer_reviews.author: James Bothamley

customer_reviews.title: Does it work?
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with my Samsung phone. The ap doesn't work on my phone. Support recommended turning off the phone service when I want to use the ap. There's no way I'm going to spend that much time to use this. My money would have been better spent on a hard wired backup camera to attach to my radio display, as this bluetooth doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1997 F350
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 97 F350 PSD. Easy install and nice picture. I hooked into my running lights so I can turn the camera on as needed/wanted. Happy that the bracket was metal and had a good finish on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Installs exactly as described. Works great! I use it on back of my travel trailer. Signal picks up fine in truck cab. Need it for backing the camper. The grid lines in viewer almost exactly one foot each so really helps to know how far stuff is behind you.
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well but was a little difficult to install because of my limited electrical skills. The app connects quickly most of the time
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality/Nice Picture
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and hook-up to the app. Clear hi-res picture with measuring lines if desired. I changed from driving a Ford Fiesta (compact) to a Nissan Frontier (much. much bigger!) and needed a way to give me a helping hand backing up the truck. This license plate camera is a great solution. I have it set up so as long as the headlights are on the camera is live, so helps in other driving situations, not just backing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: EASE TO INSTALL and camera gives just what I needed to see what was behind me backingup
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. Its is easy to install and the camera shows an excellent picture. I purchased this device so I could see what was behind me after two close calls running into a few items. I can now see what is behind me and I no longer have to worry. I give this product 5 stars as it is perfect for my needs. camera is great and easy to install. Thank you CALMOOR for making this product.
customer_reviews.author: john c. campbell

customer_reviews.title: Ease if installation
customer_reviews.text: I am installing this back up camera on a 2006 Mitsubishi Lancer. Once completed I intend to mount my tablet so the screen is larger than my phone. Once installed it blends in and is hard to tell if there is an extra component there. This is my practice car, I will be installing one on my 20 year old convertible when it is taken out of storage. I would recommend this camera to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ability to have it show on my IPhone versus a separate monitor is great.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I was looking for. I wanted a back up camera to help me hook my truck up to a variety of trailers. I did not want any additional monitors up front nor did I want to spend the money on getting a stereo that has this capability. Being able to have this show on my IPhone is perfect and installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Pass

customer_reviews.title: Good Image Quality & Solid Metal Construction
customer_reviews.text: Received Monday, installed same day, had to get a little creative for wiring into my Ford Sport Trac, it only took me about 30 minutes, spliced right into my backup lights harness, so it goes on in reverse, thought about wiring it for full time on, I wanted to see how it worked for a while, I also tested before installing it right to the car's battery, good picture on my Motorola mobile phone, solid metal construction license plate frame...........time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: J Croge

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the OEM backup camera at $700 from the Toyota dealer. Nicole in customer service was awesome and responded very quickly. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I did use a mechanic to install the camera. It took him about 2 hours but I have a Mini Cooper so I think that is why. Once I connected to the WiFi which took a few tries, it seems to be working great. The picture is wide and clear on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: More convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to install. More convenient on my phone. There is a small process to connect to it every time but not a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Jeune Roi

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me - Pixel 3a
customer_reviews.text: When first installed the app the picture was white and I thought it was a bad product. The trick I found is to start app with wifi off. It will turn the wifi on and connect with picture. Since then works good.
customer_reviews.author: mvpmal

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installed very easy. Blue tooth pairs up hassle free. I bought this because my new pick up truck did not come with a back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: gregory savage

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for great price
customer_reviews.text: I have added the camera and it was not working the way i wanted. It took too long between switching from one network to the camera network because it starts only when in return. Therefore i made the adjustment to have constant power at the camera and can look behind whenever i want. To make things even easier i setup an old cellphone for just that use. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TCI

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I thought this thing was going to totally suck. But it exceeded my expectations. The install is super easy especially if you get T-taps + zip ties (5 stars would have been to include those), and took about 15min to do. Once you've accepted the wifi connect the first time, you only need to open the app to view the camera in the future. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should with good video.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has great photo. I just wish I got the option with the display screen. If my wife or anyone uses my car, they can't use the camra. And it's kind of annoying to pull my phone out everytime to use it. I ended up just getting sensors for audio indications. So now I have both but never use the camera
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent to increase safety
customer_reviews.text: My daughter owns a 2006 dodge Dakota club cab with a cap on the bed. This back up camera greatly helps with the process of backing up and clearly seeing what us behind her. It was easy to install once I got the courage to do so. It easily synced to her phone. The picture is very clear also. We bought it for her at Christmas and she is very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, heavy duty metal license plate frame
customer_reviews.text: Works good, only thing I would like better is if it automatically popped up on my phone but I have to click on the app to use it, also sometimes there is a 10-15 second delay before it will connect. Maybe these issues are user error or can be corrected in the future. Otherwise I was impressed with the quality of both the camera and the heavy metal frame.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gehin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and wash install!
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great! Easy install as well. I ended up drilling a small hole behind my license plate and ran the wiring through that hole. Once inside the trunk I routed the wiring up and over to my back up lights. I spliced the wire and buttoned it up. Easy enough! Quality is great for the price. Keep up the great work Calmoor!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gafford

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: It works well, however, it doesn't auto connect. That's something I would have preferred. The power must be on for Wifi to connect, and I have other Wifi connections to the phone so swapping between them sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with the monitor so now I have to waist my time to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Terri Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and safety.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model 2500 Silverado and it has high ground clearance. Backing to connect to trailer by myself is much easier and in parking, backing up is much easier to get at a safe parking distance from a car or barrier with out having to get out and in the truck multiple times. It makes it safer also, which is a great reason to have one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Windham

customer_reviews.title: Calmoor Back up Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. Well worth the money. Easy to install. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Safer backing up
customer_reviews.text: Rear view fantastic +++ Stainless steel frame, ip rating water resistance, great view- a plus ability to turn guide on or off. Hook up can be back up electric or full time when connected to running lights. - vehicle may require modifications to bring camera wiring into the trunk for electrical connection
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not working.
customer_reviews.text: WiFi works. Cam does not work. No image. License plate bolts diameter too big. Please advise
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t wire it per the instruction. You have to wire it so there is power all the time then it’s fine. Otherwise you have three functions just to get it work on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Petersen

customer_reviews.title: That that grrat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for wife and it’s a pain to use. When she leaves the house you have to go to your phone settings to reset the WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Denz1023

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I thought was product. Picture looks like video screen was part of package but it's your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to install, easy to use app on both my Android and my iPhone. Great addition to my older vehicle not equipped with this from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best back up camera for the price. Good quality. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: David Congleton

customer_reviews.title: Monitor system much easier to use vs instead to the Android app cell version
customer_reviews.text: Had changed to camera with integrated monitor. Once connected to taillight, the system worked perfectly. Particularly like the monitor which came with magnetic backing to easily mount to my magnetic holder for cell. Left small footprint on dash without a lot of clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ventimiglia

customer_reviews.title: I did't buy this to use every time I back up, just to hitch boat only.
customer_reviews.text: Looks my look at hitch ball as I back up to hitch to boat.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Product installed very easily, and the frame was of very solid material. My only critique is the app could polished up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kern

customer_reviews.title: Have Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Since we live in a rual area and do not have wifi everywhere we go it can be an issue. But other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pedrotti

customer_reviews.title: It just does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I got a new one and it works great with my phone Customer service is a plus very pleasant and willing to help.
customer_reviews.author: nicotanval

customer_reviews.title: Quality gear. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with the seller and they let me know that they are working on an update for the app for ios that will allow a full screen image. That is really the only draw back to this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Love the back up camera
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves his back up camera. he drives a Vette so the windows are small and can't see anything out the back so this was a big help. easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Dina English

customer_reviews.title: Calmoor License Plate Wireless Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: This license plate camera is very well built and was very simple to install. Wish I had bought this earlier!
customer_reviews.author: allyson e jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice backup cam!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a little tricky, but overall the product works amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Ruel DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality backup cam
customer_reviews.text: Saved me tons of time and money. BMW wanted over $500 just for a video interface, this took me 45 minutes and cost just over $100. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This product I bought for my boyfriend for his toy hauler and he was really pleased with it . It’s exactly what he needed and he loves the idea of seeing the camera through his phone ! I definitely would recommend this .
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect without Breaking the Bank
customer_reviews.text: Besides such great value with great perception, the customer services has been exceptional. I truly do not regret anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Kapaona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and excellent camera.  Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install, camera has clear resolution. Would recommend this product. The customer service is very good! Would definitely make future purchase with this company James
customer_reviews.author: James Li

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Android, waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: And missed the return window due to Covid. Does not word with Galaxy 9+. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and good service
customer_reviews.text: Use the product for a enclosed trailer Works wonderfully. And the customer service is the best. Never in my life had I experienced customer service like this before. Please give this company a chance you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I’m using it in an old Volkswagen bus, and being able to use my smart phone to see what’s behind me when backing up is really easy and helps me back out safely. Easy to install and connect.
customer_reviews.author: Andre P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very easy to use and trendy license plate camera
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and trendy license plate camera! I bought it for the basic rear vision and so glad I did. Fairly easy to install. Picture quality is great. Would definitely recommend to anyone rather for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Partha Sarathi Samal

customer_reviews.title: Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy install camera view is awesome takes a little adjusting with alien wrench.I installed on my 2004 corvette i had to change the mounting screws( photo) because can't access the back of my license plate without cutting a whole in the trunk reason for 4 star .
customer_reviews.author: Frank Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my pop-up travel trailer as it hides the backup camera in my Subaru. Ran the leads up to the battery, and affixed it to the spare tire using zip-ties. Works great.. thinking about getting another one for my utility trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy install for our old Lexus. We did not want a separate unit for the reverse camera; being able to view it off a mounted smart phone makes a ton of sense.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this for my truck. It's great I am working with my company I work for too get these for our work trcks
customer_reviews.author: shirley mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Nicole is first-rate. Had an issue with my camera, she responded immediately with a quick and very satisfactory resolution. I recommend Calmoor to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Backup view
customer_reviews.text: The product allows me to backup to my trailer and hook it to my truck without additional help or getting out multiple times to check the hitch alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement - monitor not included
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it did not come with the monitor and car charger as advertised. I have not tested how it works with the phone up yet. will edit the star rating when I get it tested
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work save your money
customer_reviews.text: this product is crap, i connected correctly i did everything right i even got the wifi but it NEVER sent the camera image it sucks and a complete waste of money a complete SCAM!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MGB Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture Was very nervous after reading all the comments about app based backup camera. But,this camera is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: rich rogers

customer_reviews.title: glad I can see
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for my mustang, had no backup camera& sick of hitting my rear bumper. not anymore!! very easy installation
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The original order camera wasn't compatible with my Google pixel 2 but the customer service was great and they sent me a new system that worked for me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Illegally covers up the name of the state on the license plate! MiFi signal is constantly glitchy and only works about an eighth of the time. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Centers

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Product was very easy to install! Wired it to my backup lights and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Steed

customer_reviews.title: don't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hook to my iPad not compatibal tryes contacting company with no reply. Don't buy it if you have iphone or ipad
customer_reviews.author: Csc719

product_meta.title: Calmoor Upgrade Digital Signal Wireless Backup Camera System Kit with HD 5" Monitor IP69K Waterproof 170 Degrees Angle License Plate Camera with Parking Lines for Cars SUVs Trucks Pickups MiniVans
product_meta.description: Note: (1) This is a wireless backup camera system kit which contains a 5" monitor, so it can use the WiFi signal or phone. (2) For the cars whose license plate is on the side, such as Wrangler, it will be inconvenient to install this license plate camera, please consider it carefully before purchase. Thanks! (3) If your have any question about this wireless backup camera, please contact us ❗❗❗
feature_bullets: ⭐Upgraded Wireless Reversing Camera System Kit: It contains a 5-inch Digital Signal HD Screen, replaces Mobile Device and solves the Application uncompatible problem. Provides more convenience and safety when you are driving or reversing.

⭐IP69k Waterproof & Durable: With waterproof rate up to IP69K, backup camera would never be fogged or wet even in storm or bad rainy day. Moreover, high quality stainless steel material makes our license plate camera with frame more durable than others.

⭐HD Night Vision Camera: Designed with 8 infrared lights and HD Image Sensor, you will get HD 1024x720 pixel pictures even in darkness. With the Parking Lines, helping you measure accurate distance for parking to avoid collision and scratch backward.

⭐170° Wide Viewing Angle: Equipped with 170 degrees view, display provides you a wide viewing vision, catches all the blind spots behind the car without relying on side mirrors in addition. Mirror function makes installing camera on the front possible.

⭐Easy to Setup: You just need to put the camera on your license plate, and then power the camera and monitor separately. It is compatible with most DC 9-35v cars, like Truck, SUV, Camper, Pickup, etc. Please contact us with any problem in time, we will solve for you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: If you have any questions,please contact us in time-- acetksou@hotmail.com .
